alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Southeast Middlesex; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 8:09AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A shower with gusty winds and possible funnel cloud moving across portions of northwestern Essex and northeastern Middlesex Counties through 915 AM EDT... At 809 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sudbury, or near Framingham, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and possible funnel cloud. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Lowell, Lawrence, Haverhill, Waltham, Methuen, Billerica, Woburn, Chelmsford, Andover, Lexington, Dracut, Tewksbury, North Andover, Reading, Burlington, Wilmington, Westford, Acton, Concord, and Sudbury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Southeast Middlesex; Western Essex
